Recommendations.Title: Holiday Activity and Food (HAF) Clubs | Chorley
Key Strengths: Directly lists free school meal eligibility
Outlines activities for children aged from reception to year 11
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information about the Holiday Activity and Food (HAF) Clubs, which directly states that it is for children who receive benefits related free school meals. It also lists activities available for children aged from reception to year 11.

Recommendations.Title: Children and families support services | Chorley
Key Strengths: Indirectly lists free school meal eligibility
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information about children and family support services. While it doesn't directly mention the Holiday Activity and Food program, its content explains that free school meals can be a qualifying factor.

Recommendations.Title: Household Support Fund - 2023/24 delivery
Key Strengths: Specifies holiday periods for voucher distribution
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link discusses the Household Support Fund and mentions that Lancashire County Council retains funding to allocate Free School Meal vouchers during certain holiday periods.

Recommendations.Title: Healthy Weight Collaboration
Key Strengths: Indicates priority for families receiving free school meals
Mentions program catering to children aged 5-8
Recommendations.Reasoning: This document discusses the Healthy Weight Collaboration, which has a focus on families who receive free school meals as a priority. However, the specifics of the program are not clearly related to holiday support.

Recommendations.Title: Accessible Report Template
Key Strengths: Mentions provision of free school meal vouchers
Focuses on reducing backlog phase 7 delivery
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this document does reference provision of Free School Meal vouchers, the focus is primarily on reducing the backlog of support phase 7. Additionally, the specific holiday periods are not explicitly mentioned in the excerpt provided.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: Many links contained relevant information about council services, but only a few directly addressed free school meal eligibility or holiday activities for children. In particular, Item 3 provides insight into the HAF grant funding criteria, which could be useful when determining additional resources for holiday support.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Items 1-2 were prioritized due to their direct relevance to free school meal eligibility and holiday activities, making them the most applicable options for council customer information needs.
